name: RobunnyFactory(WIP)
description: Bunnies being put into the machines at the Robunny Factory for the sake of war. You, a Rabbit surrounded in metal and wires in the middle of a 5 story Robunny War-machine decide to break the cycle and turn, as well as free your fellow Rabbits from their robotic bindings. You do not kill, you will not shed the blood of your fellow Rabbits, but free and protect them from the evil machines.  As you go , your powerful weapons and armor fall on your way to the freedom at the top of the Robunny Factory.
